content.rendered:
Stay and play in the heart of Colorado ski/ride country!

Here at ShredLife Eco Hostel, you are just minutes from some of Colorado’s finest terrain.

The Summit Stage free public bus picks up and drops off a six minute walk away at the Dillon Valley East stop. Visit their Winter 20-21 Schedule for more information.

Drive times from our front door to popular destinations include:

Keystone: 9 minutes
Copper Mountain: 14 minutes
Araphoe Basin: 15 minutes
Loveland: 18 minutes
Breckenridge: 24 minutes
Vail: 36 minutes
Ski Cooper: 47 minutes
Beaver Creek: 49 minutes

Red Rocks (world famous concert venue): 1 hour
Black Hawk (the Vegas of the Rockies): 50 minutes

Use our bicycles to ride along the beautiful bike path to arrive in:
Frisco: 30 minutes
Breckinridge: 90 minutes

Stay With Us
